title: Canada Legalizes Marijuana & Colorado Votes to Abolish Slavery | Julian Castro
itunes:title: Canada Legalizes Marijuana & Colorado Votes to Abolish Slavery | Julian Castro
description:
Canada legalizes recreational marijuana, President Trump defends Saudi Arabia in the disappearance of Jamal Khashoggi, and Julian Castro discusses "An Unlikely Journey."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
